site.title: Volodymyr Mokhun - Front-End Developer
site.description: Volodymyr Mokhun, Front-End Developer specializing in React.js, TypeScript, Next.js.

hero.title: Volodymyr Mokhun.
hero.subtitle: a Front-End Developer
hero.description: I'm a CS student and a web developer specializing in building superb user experiences. I thrive on creating practical solutions, exploring new opportunities, and keeping the coding journey enjoyable.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: My name is Volodymyr, I'm a second-year Computer Science student at the <0>University of Warmia and Mazury</0>. My journey with programming began at the age of 15, starting with simple websites and gradually diving into more complex projects, alongside mastering Data Structures and Algorithms.
about.description2: <0>For a year</0> I worked as a Freelance Front-End developer, where I gained invaluable experience in client communication and collaborated closely with fellow developers and designers. Nowadays, I'm into building awesome stuff with <1>React</1> and Next.js. I've also embarked on a journey to master Golang, enriching my expertise in backend development.
about.description3: I also recently obtained the <0>Cambridge C1 Advanced Certificate</0>, which basically says I can handle myself just fine in English-speaking settings.
